gaps.title: Missing 7-day forecast feature
gaps.description: Current implementation only shows current weather, but requirements specify 7-day forecast.

gaps.title: Lack of error handling for forecast API failures
gaps.description: Current implementation does not handle errors for the new forecast feature as specified in the requirements.

gaps.title: No loading state for forecast data
gaps.description: The application does not show a loading state while fetching forecast data, which is required for better user experience.

gaps.title: Forecast data display format
gaps.description: The design documentation specifies that the forecast should be displayed in a card format below the current weather, which is not implemented.

gaps.title: Refresh functionality for forecast data
gaps.description: The ability to refresh the forecast data is not currently implemented as per the new requirements.
